infotexts.afflictiondescription.revived: You have been brought back from death's door.
infotexts.entitydescription.revive_syringe: A powerful mix to prevent eternal rest. Effective only on the dead.
infotexts.entitydescription.nanobots: A syringe full of tiny medical robots. They can heal everyone including previously revived people.
infotexts.entitydescription.empty_syringe: A empty syringe used for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.symbiosis_syringe: A syringe containing a refined symbiote, granting strength and awareness while binding host and parasite as one.
infotexts.entitydescription.xenocrystal: A alien crystal formed from various metals.
